verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and tell<WH559> them,<WH935> 'When you have come into the land<WH776> of your habitations,<WH4186> which I give to you,<WH5414>

and will make<WH6213> an offering by fire<WH801> to Yahweh,<WH3068> a burnt offering,<WH5930> or a sacrifice,<WH2077> to accomplish<WH6381> a vow,<WH5088> or as a freewill offering,<WH5071> or in your set feasts,<WH4150> to make<WH6213> a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh,<WH3068> of the herd,<WH1241> or of the flock;<WH6629>

then he who offers<WH7126> his offering<WH7133> shall offer<WH7126> to Yahweh<WH3068> a meal offering<WH4503> of a tenth part of an ephah<WH6241> of fine flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with the fourth<WH7243> part of a hin<WH1969> of oil:<WH8081>

and wine<WH3196> for the drink offering,<WH5262> the fourth<WH7243> part of a hin,<WH1969> you shall prepare<WH6213> with the burnt offering,<WH5262> or for the sacrifice,<WH2077> for each<WH259> lamb.<WH3532>

<WH352>"'Or for a ram, you shall prepare<WH6213> for a meal offering<WH4503> two<WH8147> tenth parts of an ephah<WH6241> of fine flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with the third<WH7992> part of a hin<WH1969> of oil:<WH8081>
and for the drink offering<WH5262> you shall offer<WH7126> the third<WH7992> part of a hin<WH1969> of wine,<WH3196> of a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
When you prepare<WH6213> a bull<WH1121> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> or for a sacrifice,<WH2077> to accomplish<WH6381> a vow,<WH5088> or for peace offerings<WH8002> to Yahweh;<WH3068>

then shall he offer<WH7126> with the bull<WH1241> a meal offering<WH4503> of three<WH7969> tenth parts of an ephah<WH6241> of fine flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with half<WH2677> a hin<WH1969> of oil:<WH8081>
and you shall offer<WH7126> for the drink offering<WH5262> half<WH2677> a hin<WH1969> of wine,<WH3196> for an offering made by fire,<WH801> of a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
Thus shall it be done<WH6213> for each<WH259> bull,<WH7794> or for each<WH259> ram,<WH352> or for each of the male lambs,<WH3532> or of the young goats.<WH5795>
According to the number<WH4557> that you shall prepare,<WH6213> so<WH3602> you shall do<WH6213> to everyone<WH259> according to their number.<WH4557>
<WH249>"'All who are native-born shall do<WH6213> these things in this way,<WH7126> in offering an offering made by fire,<WH801> of a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

If a stranger<WH1616> lives as a foreigner<WH1616> with you,<WH8432> or whoever may be among you throughout your generations,<WH1755> and will offer<WH6213> an offering made by fire,<WH801> of a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh;<WH3068> as you do,<WH6213> so he shall do.<WH6213>

For the assembly,<WH6951> there shall be one<WH259> statute<WH2708> for you,<WH1616> and for the stranger who lives as a foreigner,<WH1616> a statute<WH2708> forever<WH5769> throughout your generations:<WH1755> as you are,<WH1616> so shall the foreigner be before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>
One<WH259> law<WH8451> and one<WH259> ordinance<WH4941> shall be for you,<WH1616> and for the stranger who lives as a foreigner with you.<WH1481>'"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and tell<WH559> them,<WH935> 'When you come into the land<WH776> where I bring you,<WH935>
then it shall be that when you eat<WH398> of the bread<WH3899> of the land,<WH776> you shall offer up<WH7311> a wave offering<WH8641> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

Of the first<WH7225> of your dough<WH6182> you shall offer up<WH7311> a cake<WH2471> for a wave offering:<WH8641> as the wave offering<WH8641> of the threshing<WH1637> floor,<WH7311> so you shall heave it.
Of the first<WH7225> of your dough<WH6182> you shall give<WH5414> to Yahweh<WH3068> a wave offering<WH8641> throughout your generations.<WH1755>
<WH7686>"'When you shall err, and not observe<WH6213> all these commandments,<WH4687> which Yahweh<WH3068> has spoken<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872>
even all that Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded<WH6680> you by Moses,<WH4872> from the day<WH3117> that Yahweh<WH3068> gave commandment,<WH1755> and onward throughout your generations;

then it shall be,<WH6213> if it be done unwittingly,<WH7684> without the knowledge<WH5869> of the congregation,<WH5712> that all the congregation<WH5712> shall offer<WH6213> one<WH259> young<WH1121> bull<WH6499> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh,<WH3068> with the meal offering<WH4503> of it,<WH5262> and the drink offering of it,<WH4941> according to the ordinance, and one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH8163> for a sin offering.<WH2403>

The priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and they shall be forgiven;<WH5545> for it was an error,<WH7684> and they have brought<WH935> their offering,<WH7133> an offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh,<WH3068> and their sin offering<WH2403> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> for their error:<WH7684>

and all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall be forgiven,<WH5545> and the stranger<WH1616> who lives as a foreigner<WH1616> among<WH8432> them;<WH5971> for in respect of all the people it was done unwittingly.<WH7684>
<WH5315>"'If one person<WH5315> sins<WH2398> unwittingly,<WH7684> then he shall offer<WH7126> a female goat<WH5795> a<WH1323> year<WH8141> old for a sin offering.<WH2403>

The priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for the soul<WH5315> who errs,<WH7683> when he sins<WH2398> unwittingly,<WH7684> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> to make atonement<WH3722> for him;<WH5545> and he shall be forgiven.

You shall have one<WH259> law<WH8451> for him who does anything<WH6213> unwittingly,<WH7684> for him who is native-born<WH249> among the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and for the stranger<WH1616> who lives as a foreigner<WH1616> among them.<WH8432>

<WH5315>"'But the soul who does<WH6213> anything with a high hand,<WH7311> whether he is native-born<WH249> or a foreigner,<WH4480> the same blasphemes<WH1442> Yahweh;<WH3068> and that soul<WH5315> shall be cut off<WH3772> from among<WH7130> his people.<WH5971>

Because he has despised<WH959> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and has broken<WH6565> his commandment,<WH4687> that soul<WH5315> shall utterly<WH3772> be cut off;<WH3772> his iniquity shall be on him.<WH5771>'"
While the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were in the wilderness,<WH4057> they found<WH4672> a man<WH376> gathering<WH7197> sticks<WH6086> on the Sabbath<WH7676> day.<WH3117>
Those who found<WH4672> him gathering<WH7197> sticks<WH6086> brought<WH7126> him to Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> and to all the congregation.<WH5712>
They put<WH3240> him in custody,<WH4929> because it had not been declared<WH6567> what should be done to him.<WH6213>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "The man<WH376> shall surely<WH4191> be put to death:<WH4191> all the congregation<WH5712> shall stone<WH7275> him with stones<WH7275> outside<WH2351> of the camp.<WH4264>"
All the congregation<WH5712> brought<WH3318> him outside<WH2351> of the camp,<WH4264> and stoned<WH7275> him to death<WH4191> with stones;<WH68> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and tell<WH559> them that they should make<WH6213> themselves fringes<WH6734> in the borders<WH3671> of their garments<WH899> throughout their generations,<WH1755> and that they put<WH5414> on the fringe<WH6734> of each border<WH3671> a cord<WH6616> of blue:<WH8504>

and it shall be to you for a fringe,<WH6734> that you may look<WH7200> on it,<WH2142> and remember all the commandments<WH4687> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and do<WH6213> them;<WH8446> and that you not follow after<WH310> your own heart<WH3824> and your own eyes,<WH5869> after<WH310> which you use to play the prostitute;<WH2181>
that you may remember<WH2142> and do<WH6213> all my commandments,<WH4687> and be<WH1961> holy<WH6918> to your God.<WH430>
I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who brought you out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> to be your God:<WH430> I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>"
